  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:ait.opetaja.ee:2cbf05344d3511bbe95f11fa1b28dfb07c0604fc</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>1</catalog>
            <entry>2cbf05344d3511bbe95f11fa1b28dfb07c0604fc</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Õhk</string>
            <string language="en">Air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αέρας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aire</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Õppematerjal on koostatud lähtuvalt alushariduse raamõppekavast ja lasteaia õppekavast. Õppematerjal annab ülevaate teema käsitlemiseks, mis kajastab kuulamist, kõnelemist, vaatlemist ja uurimist. Materjal on esitatud PowerPointina.</string>
            <string language="en">Study material based on preschool education frame curriculum. Study material gives an overview about covering a topic of listening. speaking, observation and research. PowerPoint presentation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Loodus</string>
            <string language="et">Ilmastik</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Nature</string>
            <string language="en">Climate</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studieren Sie das Material, das auf 
Vorschulausbildung Feldlehrplan basiert. Studie Material gibt 
einen Überblick über das Umfassen eines Themas des Hörensprechens, 
-beobachtung und -forschung. PowerPoint Darstellung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matériel d'étude basé sur le programme 
d'études préscolaire de trame d'éducation. Le matériel 
d'étude donne une vue d'ensemble au sujet de couvrir un sujet de 
parler, d'observation et de recherche d'écoute. Présentation 
de PowerPoint.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Material do estudo baseado no curriculum 
pré-escolar do frame da instrução. O material do estudo dá 
uma vista geral sobre a coberta de um tópico do discurso, da 
observação e da pesquisa escutar. Apresentação de 
PowerPoint.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiale di studio basato sul programma di studi
prescolare della struttura di formazione. Il materiale di studio
dà una descrizione circa riguardare un soggetto parlare, 
dell'osservazione e della ricerca ascoltare. Presentazione del 
PowerPoint.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υλικό μελέτης βασισμένο στο προσχολικό πρόγραμμα 
σπουδών πλαισίων εκπαίδευσης. Το υλικό μελέτης δίνει μια 
επισκόπηση για την κάλυψη ενός θέματος της ομιλίας, της 
παρατήρησης και της έρευνας ακούσματος. PowerPoint 
παρουσίαση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Material del estudio basado en plan de estudios 
preescolar del marco de la educación. El material del estudio 
da una descripción sobre cubrir un asunto del discurso, de la 
observación y de la investigación el escuchar. Presentación 
de PowerPoint.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Climat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Clima</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Clima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασική εκπαίδευση</string>
